answers.answer: Yea u felt like that Friday n sat i was crying all day for no reason i think is just ur hormones try to watch some romantic or funny movies youll feel better or go shopping for baby clothes I'll make u feel better :)
Thanks, I mean I am lossing my mind I was talking about up comming events and I completely left out my daughter's birthday and my husband's. I also Am very light headed and dizzy!! Ugh lol

Maybe you should go get a check up. See how your iron and blood pressure is. Sometimes it is just hormones but other times it could be low iron or high blood pressure. I felt that way also and wound up having preeclampsia.
Dnt worry is just part of being pregnant some days youll feel like crap and some other days youll feel good .
